data.name: Vulva Goddess
data.detailed_description:
You must have stumbled into another dimension. An enormous expanse, seemingly frozen in time, stretches out in front of you.
A face that covers the whole sky appears before you.
"Welcome equal", their voice booms, "You have come to my starlit Vulva realm. And I have prepared 8 challenges for you."

Create

- Build bodies and vulvas to explore human diversity while The Goddess guides you.

- Pick vulva- and labia-shapes and colors to adorn your creations.
- Add pretty stickers.

Achieve

- Take on The Goddess' challenges.

- Make her happy when you complete them.
- Notice how the Goddess grows more fond of your time together..

Learn

- Listen to The Goddess as she shares Vulva facts that make her heart sing.

- Look at the sources of her claims.

Welcome to the Vulva Realm and into The Goddess' heart.

data.short_description: A non-sexual 2D-game where you build custom vulvas together with a Vulva Goddess. Create diverse bodies and thrill The Goddess by trying on different vulva- & labia-shapes, pubic hair and stickers. The intention is to inspire awe and joy and lessen the shame we feel about genetalia diversity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game is educational and contains art of stylized vulvas.
